sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { View, Text, Image, ScrollView, StyleSheet, TouchableOpacity, Linking } from 'react-native';

export default function HomeScreen({ navigation }) {
  return (
    <ScrollView style={styles.page} contentContainerStyle={{ alignItems: 'center' }}>
      <View style={styles.header}>
        <Image source={{ uri: 'https://movingtruckrentalnearme.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Logos-8.png' }} style={styles.logo} />
        <Text style={styles.phone}>+27-71-021-7804</Text>
      </View>

      <Image source={{ uri: 'https://movingtruckrentalnearme.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Hero-Section-Image-22-800x450.webp' }} style={styles.hero} />

      <Text style={styles.title}>Your Local and Long Distance Moving Truck Rental.</Text>
      <Text style={styles.subtitle}>Experience Unmatched Travel — reliable, professional, and affordable truck rentals for local and national moves.</Text>

      <View style={styles.ctaRow}>
        <TouchableOpacity style={styles.cta} onPress={() => navigation.navigate('Booking')}>
          <Text style={styles.ctaText}>Book Now</Text>
        </TouchableOpacity>
        <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.cta, styles.ctaAlt]} onPress={() => Linking.openURL('https://wa.link/oyncbp')}>
          <Text style={styles.ctaText}>WhatsApp Us</Text>
        </TouchableOpacity>
      </View>

      <View style={styles.features}>
        <View style={styles.featureItem}>
          <Text style={styles.featureTitle}>Multiple Payment Options</Text>
          <Text style={styles.featureText}>Pay online, bank transfer, or in person.</Text>
        </View>
        <View style={styles.featureItem}>
          <Text style={styles.featureTitle}>Same & Next Day Bookings</Text>
          <Text style={styles.featureText}>Flexible scheduling to meet urgent needs.</Text>
        </View>
        <View style={styles.featureItem}>
          <Text style={styles.featureTitle}>Nationwide Coverage</Text>
          <Text style={styles.featureText}>We deliver across South Africa & nearby regions.</Text>
        </View>
      </View>

      <View style={styles.footer}>
        <Text>Contact: office@movingtruckrentalnearme.co.za</Text>
        <Text>© {new Date().getFullYear()} Moving Truck Rental Near Me</Text>
      </View>
    </ScrollView>
  );
}

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
  page: { backgroundColor: '#fff', flex: 1 },
  header: { width: '100%', padding: 16, flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center' },
  logo: { width: 140, height: 40, resizeMode: 'contain' },
  phone: { fontWeight: '700' },
  hero: { width: '95%', height: 220, resizeMode: 'cover', borderRadius: 8, marginVertical: 12 },
  title: { fontSize: 22, fontWeight: '800', textAlign: 'center', marginVertical: 8 },
  subtitle: { textAlign: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 20, color: '#444', marginBottom: 12 },
  ctaRow: { flexDirection: 'row', gap: 12, marginBottom: 20 },
  cta: { backgroundColor: '#1e90ff', padding: 12, borderRadius: 6, marginHorizontal: 6 },
  ctaAlt: { backgroundColor: '#25D366' },
  ctaText: { color: '#fff', fontWeight: '700' },
  features: { width: '95%', padding: 12 },
  featureItem: { padding: 10, borderBottomWidth: 1, borderColor: '#eee' },
  featureTitle: { fontWeight: '700' },
  featureText: { color: '#555' },
  footer: { marginTop: 24, padding: 12, alignItems: 'center', borderTopWidth: 1, borderColor: '#eee', width: '100%' }
});
